title: The Working Dead
description: New York Detective Armand DiPino is back home in San Francisco. A bullet to the head has left him with Transitory Partial Amnesia. He meets Emily an old flame and becomes involved in a human trafficking case in which her powerful father is the prime suspect. The case ensnares his own family and DiPino fights to unravel the conspiracy that got him shot in the first place. Only now he doesnâ€™t recognize his killers who stalk him as he retraces the same leads.
author: David Thayer
